mapper.insert: insert into eventDB (EventName, Participant, Payer, EventDate, Price, TravelName) values (#{EventName}, #{Participant}, #{Payer}, #{EventDate}, #{Price}, #{TravelName})
mapper.select: select EventName, Payer, Price, Date from eventDB where TravelName = #{TravelName}
select EventName, Payer, Price, Participant, EventDate from eventDB where Event_id = #{Event_id}
select EventName, EventDate, Price, Payer, Participant from eventDB where participant LIKE concat('%', #{PersonName}, '%')
select count(*) from event where TravelName = #{TravelName}
